subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hello everyone !!!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
On Thu, 24 Apr 2008, Ralph Smith wrote:

> Hi all,
>
> Ralph here again. Seems every time I come back on to leave a message
> there's some bickering going on. I can't leave you people for a minute
> without some hoopla going on LOL (just Kidding). Well how ya'll doing ?

There seemed to be something happening all around over the last few days 
or week.  It wasn't just here.  I am on 62 Yahoogroups and almost all of 
them broke out in arguing and bickering at the same time. I have NEVER 
seen that happen! And one of my favorite area bands had some really 
bizarre and unpleasant things happen at a show on Saturday night. And we 
had three earthquakes here. Some thought all of these events were caused 
by the full moon.  I dunno, it was still very odd but seems to have passed 
now. Lives are retue=rning to normal.

> Fine I hope. I have been busy with my Paranormal Group and
> investigations and Gettysburg. I was in Gettysburg over this past
> weekend and got an EVP in the Triagular Field that said " Never trust
> Abe Lincoln " LOL must have been a Rebel soldier. I thought that was
> pretty cool.

It also could've been a Union soldier who didn't like his outcome!

I really want to get the chance to visit Gettysburg.  I am pretty sure 
Batleground, Indiana (the site of the Battle of Tippecanoe in 1811) is 
haunted by some of the former soldiers.  I've been to that one many times 
but never tried to get any EVP there.

Zack
